com.uzh.gwt.softeng.server

Class MySQLConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uzh.gwt.softeng.server.MySQLConnector

  • public class MySQLConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    The MYSQLConnector class is responsible for connecting to a mySQL database and for reading and writing to it.

        public static void openConnection()
                           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                  java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                  java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Opens connection to MySQL database instance.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If it cannot open connection.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - If the class or its nullary constructor is not accessible.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If this Class represents an abstract class, an interface, an array class, a primitive type, or void; or if the class has no nullary constructor; or if the instantiation fails for some other reason.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the class cannot be located.
